title: Is wudu valid if you forget how many times you wiped or you wiped more than 3 - Sheikh AssimAlHakeem
transcript: Binta says during wouldl if someone accidentally wipes apart more than they should or forgot how many times is the wood will invalid what should they do example wiping the arms feet more than three times or wiping the head ears more than one time know that the wood is valid it is not affected if you don't know it's not affected if you know and you wiped it four times your sinful for the first time but your wood is still valid
